The record date for the distribution by Hewlett-Packard Company (HP Co.) of shares of Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company to the holders of HP Co. common stock was at the close of business on 10/21/15. The distribution of the shares is scheduled to occur on 11/01/15. The number of Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company shares set forth above includes an estimate of the number of shares to be delivered pursuant to the redemption by HP Co. of certain shares of its preferred stock in exchange for shares of Hewlett Packard Enterprise Company common stock, as more fully described in HP Co.'s Form 8-K filed with the SEC on 10/22/15.
Rishi Varma, SVP, Deputy GC and Assistant Secretary for Hewlett-Packard Company 2015-10-23
